generated.html:
Tali Featured in CMUSE

September 21, 2020

Thanks a bunch to CMUSE.org for choosing me to be a part of their top selection of 15 Websites To Learn Recorder Online. There are a lot of great resources there and it's an honor to be featured among them. My site is less than 6 months old at the time of writing this article, and it's great that people are finding it useful, I had no idea if anyone would ever see it!

To get started with the basics, feel free to checkout my Tutorials page and get some short lessons on the fundamentals of the recorder. Once you feel comfortable with that material, you can book a free trial lesson with me and we can work through things more in depth.

I look forward to teaching you soon!

~ Tali
